Tests that evaluating object literal in the console correctly reported.

{a:1, b:2}
Object {a: 1, b: 2}
{a:1}
Object {a: 1}
{var a = 1; eval("{a :1, b:2 }");}
    VM:2 Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected identifier(…)
{ for (var i = 0; i < 5; ++i); }
    VM:2 Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected token var(…)
